text:
@realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump,
YOU fired the pandemic response team.
YOU cut the Centers for Disease Control budget.
YOU spent weeks downplaying the seriousness of the epidemic.
YOU wasted WEEKS when you should have been getting the government ready.
YOUR new budget cuts the CDC AGAIN.
YOU.
